title: Perform Asset Condition Monitoring
description: A technician is performing a routine condition monitoring route, collecting data from various assets.

tasks.description: Download the day's inspection route to a handheld data collector.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician gets the list of assets and the required readings for the day.

tasks.description: Go to the first asset on the route and collect the required data (e.g., temperature reading, vibration data).
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician collects the data using the handheld device.

tasks.description: Upload the collected data to the maintenance system. The system automatically flags any readings that are outside normal operating limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician uploads the data, and the system generates an alert for one asset with a high temperature reading.
